revised_title: Experiments on the Descent of Sap in Trees and its Influence on Growth
tldr: Thomas Andrew Knight investigates the descent of sap in trees and its influence on growth, discovering that factors such as gravity, motion, capillary attraction, and vessel conformation contribute to the descent of sap and the formation of wood. He also observes how tree forms are adapted to their environment and how tree growth is affected by factors such as wind, light, and proximity to other trees.
